info.title: DF: Asset Management
info.description:
Has accountability for:
- managing Assets in data zone
	- creating data brew jobs for profiling and data conversion 
	- running data bre job for profiling and data quality

id.description: the identifier of the Amazon DataZone inventory asset..

domainId.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the inventory asset exists.

name.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the inventory asset.

description.description: The description of an Amazon DataZone inventory asset.

owningProjectId.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone project that owns the inventory asset.

typeIdentifier.description: The identifier of the asset type of the specified Amazon DataZone inventory asset.

typeRevision.description: The revision of the inventory asset type.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the Amazon DataZone inventory asset was created.

createdBy.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the inventory asset.

count.description: No. of results returned when pagination requested.

lastEvaluatedToken.description: Token used to paginate to the next page of search result.

dataSourceId.description: Data Zone asset data source id

accountId.description: The account id here the asset resides

revision.description: specify the version number of the datazone asset

roleArn.description: The Arn of the IAM Role to be used for the job execution

format.description: The format of the data set.

path.description: The uri of the source S3 file

region.description: The region of the S3 bucket

accountId.description: The account Id the glue table belongs to

region.description: The region of the glue table

databaseName.description: The database name the glue table belongs to

secretArn.description: The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret containing redshift credentials.

jdbcConnectionUrl.description: JDBC URL for the redshift cluster or workgroup.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID for the Glue connection.

securityGroupIdList.description: Security group Ids for the Glue connection.

availabilityZone.description: Availability zone for the Glue connection.

path.description: Path for the Glue Crawler data source (e.g. /dev/public/table_x) (used in glue crawler without recipe job)

databaseTableName.description: The database table name for DataBrew dataset (used in recipe job data set).

queryString.description: The query string for DataBrew dataset (used in recipe job data set).

type.description: The type of the redshift db used.

workgroupName.description: The name of the serverless workgroup the DB belongs to(used by data zone).

clusterName.description: The cluster name of the DB cluster to(used by data zone).

name.description: The name of the existing recipe

version.description: The version of the existing recipe

ruleset.description: A Data Quality Definition Language (DQDL) ruleset. For more information, see the Glue developer guide.

tags.description: tags to be added to our data brew constructs description etc.
